author: drkovalskyi
body: This bug fix is for the issue reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/23704. The fix disables the trigger matching in ZmmSkim, which is not properly configured for reHLT. No trigger matching is needed for the skim, so it's better to disable it rather than pollute the customization file to overrider the HLT process name for reHLT workflows.
title: [muon-bugfix] disabled trigger matching in ZmmSkim
